sentences.en: A filter will remove most impurities found in water.
sentences.cn: 过滤器会滤掉水中的大部分杂质。

sentences.en: As a rule of thumb, a cup of filter coffee contains about 80mg of caffeine.
sentences.cn: 凭经验估计，一杯过滤咖啡约含80毫克咖啡因。

sentences.en: Change the filter cartridge as often as instructed by the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 按照生产厂家的使用说明，经常更换过滤筒。

sentences.en: Charcoal is used to filter water.
Dustbags act as a filter and suction will be reduced if they are too full.
sentences.cn: 集尘袋起着过滤的作用，所集的灰尘太多时其吸附作用就会减小。

sentences.en: filter cigarettes (= with a filter at the end )
Filter out all the dirt before using the water.
sentences.cn: 在用水以前先将其中不清洁的东西过滤掉.

sentences.en: In X - ray fluorescence, pieces of the filter are used directly.
sentences.cn: 在 X 射线荧光法中, 可直接使用滤纸.

sentences.en: It took months before the findings began to filter through to the politicians.
sentences.cn: 调查结果数月后才传到从政者的耳朵里。

sentences.en: Plants and trees filter carbon dioxide out of the air and produce oxygen.
sentences.cn: 花草树木会过滤掉空气中的二氧化碳并制造氧气。

sentences.en: She gathered loose soil and let it filter slowly through her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她捧起疏松的泥土，任其缓缓地从指间漏下。

sentences.en: She slotted in a fresh filter.
sentences.cn: 她放进了一张新的滤纸。

sentences.en: The best prevention for cholera is to boil or filter water, and eat only well-cooked food.
sentences.cn: 预防霍乱的最佳方法是将水煮沸或过滤，并且只食用煮熟后的食物。

sentences.en: The lake water passes through a filter before it is piped to our homes.
sentences.cn: 湖水过滤后用管道输送到各家各户.

sentences.en: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.cn: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

sentences.en: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.cn: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.en: This congealed muck was interfering with the filter.
sentences.cn: 这团凝固的污物堵塞了过滤器。

sentences.en: You might use a yellow filter to improve the clarity of a hazy horizon.
sentences.cn: 可以使用黄色滤光器让模糊的视野更加清晰。

words.tran_cn: [电子][光]滤波器；[轻][核][化工]过滤器；筛选；滤光器

trans.tran_cn: 过滤器，筛选（过滤）程序，分流信号/指示灯
trans.tran_en: something that you pass water, air etc through in order to remove unwanted substances and make it clean or suitable to use

trans.tran_cn: 过滤，渗透，泄露，仅可左转行驶
trans.tran_en: to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
to remove unwanted substances from water, air etc by passing it through a special substance or piece of equipment
